description: Managing the NICs of Arc for SCVMM Virtual Machine.

commands.name: az scvmm vm nic add
commands.summary: Add a network interface card to a virtual machine.
commands.syntax:
az scvmm vm nic add --name
                    --resource-group
                    --vm-name
                    [--ipv4-address-type {Dynamic, Static}]
                    [--ipv6-address-type {Dynamic, Static}]
                    [--mac-address]
                    [--mac-address-type {Dynamic, Static}]
                    [--network]
                    [--no-wait]
examples: az scvmm vm nic add --subscription contoso-sub --resource-group contoso-rg --vm-name contoso-vm --name nic_1 --network contoso-vnet --ipv4-address-type Dynamic --mac-address-type Dynamic

commands.name: az scvmm vm nic delete
commands.summary: Delete NICs of a virtual machine.
examples: az scvmm vm nic delete --subscription contoso-sub --resource-group contoso-rg --vm-name contoso-vm --nics nic_1 nic_2

commands.name: az scvmm vm nic list
commands.summary: Retrieve the list of NICs present in a VM.
examples: az scvmm vm nic list --subscription contoso-sub --resource-group contoso-rg --vm-name contoso-vm

commands.name: az scvmm vm nic show
commands.summary: Get the details of a NIC present in a VM.
examples: az scvmm vm nic show --subscription contoso-sub --resource-group contoso-rg --vm-name contoso-vm --name nic_1

commands.name: az scvmm vm nic update
commands.summary: Update a NIC of a VM.
commands.syntax:
az scvmm vm nic update --resource-group
                       --vm-name
                       [--disconnect {false, true}]
                       [--ipv4-address-type {Dynamic, Static}]
                       [--ipv6-address-type {Dynamic, Static}]
                       [--mac-address-type {Dynamic, Static}]
                       [--name]
                       [--network]
                       [--nic-id]
                       [--no-wait]
examples: az scvmm vm nic update --subscription contoso-sub --resource-group contoso-rg --vm-name contoso-vm --name nic_1 --network contoso-vnet --ipv4-address-type Dynamic --mac-address-type Dynamic

commands.name: az scvmm vm nic wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition of the vm nic is met.
